title: Leaver Buster... Really Riot
body: I understand those who leave games should be punished.  But server failures and disconnection shouldn't be.  How do you challenge leaver buster if it was unintentional?

replies.body:
DCs happen, everyone knows it and so does Riot. That's why your first few disconnections won't issue any punishments. If you're DCing or AFKing a lot, at a certain point you have to take responsibility for the effect you are having on other players. 

Not to mention it's very easy to spoof an unintentional disconnection (just unplug your ethernet cable or turn off your wireless).
